stressTests.name: Worst Historical Day Repeated
stressTests.scenario: The largest martingale sequence loss happens

stressTests.name: Multiple Martingale Failures
stressTests.scenario: 3 martingale sequences fail in one day

stressTests.name: 10 Consecutive Losses
stressTests.scenario: 10 trades lose in a row at average loss

stressTests.name: Maximum Positions All Lose
stressTests.scenario: All max concurrent positions (23) close at loss

stressTests.name: Black Swan Event
stressTests.scenario: Market gaps 200 pips against all positions

recommendations.recommendation: Consider reducing scaling factor to 0.5 or lower
recommendations.reason: Current scaling factor of 0.65 may be too aggressive for martingale strategies

recommendations.recommendation: Implement dynamic position sizing based on daily P&L
recommendations.reason: Reduce position size by 50% after any loss exceeding 2% of balance
Each additional level exponentially increases risk

recommendations.recommendation: Skip martingale sequences near daily calculation time (7-9 PM EST)
recommendations.reason: Avoid having open martingale sequences during daily loss calculation

recommendations.recommendation: Set hard stop at 4.5% daily loss
recommendations.reason: Provides 0.5% buffer before Tiger's 5% daily limit

recommendations.recommendation: Implement time-based stops for martingale sequences
recommendations.reason: Close all martingale positions if not recovered within 4 hours

recommendations.recommendation: Set up real-time drawdown alerts at 2%, 3%, and 4% levels
recommendations.reason: Early warning system to prevent limit breaches

recommendations.recommendation: Track correlation between Gold positions and market volatility
recommendations.reason: Gold martingale strategies perform poorly in high volatility

warnings.warning: Phase 1 may take 31 days, close to 30-day limit
warnings.impact: Risk of failing evaluation due to time constraints

warnings.warning: Only 5.8% safety margin for daily loss
warnings.impact: High risk of breaching 5% daily loss limit

warnings.warning: 52% of source trades use martingale - high risk strategy
warnings.impact: Single bad sequence could blow the account

warnings.warning: Strategy uses up to 23 concurrent positions
warnings.impact: May hit broker position limits or margin requirements

verdict.rationale: 23.29% survival rate is too low. Strategy has unacceptable risk for Tiger Funded.
